question: To fulfill the obligations under which among the following treaties, the government of India publishes the National Communication (NATCOM) periodically?
option1: U. S. -India Civil Nuclear Cooperation Initiative
option2: World Summit on the Information Society
option3: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
answer: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
explanation: The Government of India publishes National Communication periodically to fulfill the obligations under United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC). In 2004, India submitted its initial report.
